events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to customer mentioning refund request.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's request.
Hello, I’m very sorry to hear about this issue. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and attached is a picture showing the incorrect item I received.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide instructions to return the wrong item.
Thank you for your prompt help, I appreciate the quick refund process and will follow the return instructions.
The refund has been processed successfully, and the return shipping label has been sent to your email.
We wanted to check in and ensure you received the refund and if you need any further assistance.
Since your refund has been successfully completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case.
